alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 6:18AM PST until January 19 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations between 1 and 3 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Number 2 Canyon, Ephrata, Mansfield, Quincy, Wenatchee, Badger Mountain Road, Othello, Cashmere, Number 1 Canyon, Entiat, Moses Lake, Pangborn Airport, Chelan, and Waterville. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 3 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening and Friday morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will start off as snow Thursday potentially mixing with sleet or freezing rain on Friday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel

area.areaDesc: Moses Lake Area; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area
